articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Zhang Weihua's children on the threshold of the New Year Juche 94 (2005).
 It was conveyed Thursday to an official concerned.    
 The ribbon of the basket bore the letters "We sincerely wish the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il good health".

articles.content:
Message of Greetings to Speaker of Legislative Council of Palestine 
    Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Rauhi Fattouh, speaker of the Legislative Council of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the start of the Palestinian revolution.
 The message extended firm solidarity to the Palestinian people in their just cause to put an end to Israel's moves of aggression on the territory and people of Palestine and build an independent state with Kuds as its capital.
